original_title: Rodney Dangerfield Hosts the 9th Annual Young Comedians Special
overview: Some of the best new talent is showcased in these annual comedy specials each year. Every show is hosted by a different accomplished comedian. In 1984, the 9th year, the host was the magnificent Rodney Dangerfield.
title: Rodney Dangerfield Hosts the 9th Annual Young Comedians Special
